create_entry.default: Successfully authenticated. If you would like to monitor your contacts, visit the Integrations>Options menu.

init.title: Choose Contact Types
init.description: Select the type(s) of contacts you would like to monitor. If you select nothing, any existing contacts being monitored will be removed. To avoid this, close this dialog without submitting and no changes will be saved.

include_or_exclude_contacts.title: Choose Contacts to Monitor
include_or_exclude_contacts.description: You can pick which contacts you want to monitor. If you choose `include`, only the contacts you select will be added. If you choose `exclude`, all contacts but the ones you select will be added. Any existing contacts you were monitoring that do not fit within these rules will be removed.

no_contacts.title: No Contacts Found
no_contacts.description: Unable to find any contacts for the contact types you selected. After clicking `Submit`, all existing contacts being monitored will be removed. To avoid this, close this dialog without submitting and no changes will be saved.
